mapper.insert: insert into sys_logininfor (login_name, status, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, msg, login_time) values (#{loginName}, #{status}, #{ipaddr}, #{loginLocation}, #{browser}, #{os}, #{msg}, sysdate())
mapper.select:
SELECT a.info_id, a.login_name, b.user_name, a.ipaddr, a.login_location, a.browser, a.os, a. STATUS, a.msg, a.login_time FROM sys_logininfor a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.login_name = b.login_name
AND a.ipaddr like concat('%', #{ipaddr}, '%')
AND a.status = #{status}
AND a.login_name like concat('%', #{loginName}, '%')
AND b.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
and date_format(a.login_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
